bio: I am a department manager with experience leading large-scale projects as a Product Owner. I possess strong full-stack development skills in JavaScript, including modern tools and frameworks. I enjoy working on complex and creative projects, implementing innovative solutions, and delivering high-quality products. I adapt easily to new tasks and strive for maximum efficiency both in team management and development. Always eager to learn and ready to leverage my expertise to achieve company goals and bring exciting projects to life.
name: Salnykov Nikita
team-leadership: Leadership and selection of key team members.
educational-projects: Managing projects in the educational sector.
collaboration-open: I am open to collaborating on a wide range of projects, both intricate and straightforward, and I am prepared to bring complex ideas to life :)
response-prompt: I will try to answer you as soon as possible
